EasyGlide.ahk
Information
Description

Make the middle mouse button drag any window, in any internal point.  Additionally, if you let go while dragging, the window will "glide" for short distance, and even bounce off the edges of the screen.  The distance and "bouncyness" can be adjusted by changing constants

Author

ManaUser, PhiLo, Laszlo

Source

https://​autohotkey​.com​/board​/topic​/18184-gui-float-question-expertwise​-person-help-needed​/​#entry119229
